|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = 27.2 mm x 87.1 mm x 17.2 mm |weight = 25 g
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== :USB 3.0 interface
This device is presumed to be an [[Edimax EW-7822UAC]] based on it's specifications and appearance.
There is no '''Elecom''' specific USB in their drivers. The USB ID may be the default RTL8812AU ID (0bda:8812 / <small>USB\VID_0BDA&PID_8812</small>).
<!-- Additional specs, per '''Elecom''''s product page, follow... *Dimensions: [[Dimensions::27.2 mm x 87.1 mm x 17.2 mm]] *Weight:: [[Weight::25 g]] *MSRP: 8,977 yen (~$92.83 USD) -->
{{WiFiCert|WFA19461|09/09/2013}}
